remarks: If the results of cyclically shifting two words are equal, the length of the two words was equal.  (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 5-Jun-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)
statement: cshwleneq $p |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ U e. Word V ) /\ ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) /\ ( W cyclShift N ) = ( U cyclShift M ) ) -> ( # ` W ) = ( # ` U ) ) $.
